thread.section_title: Lovehoney Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.lovehoney.co.uk
thread.title: stephen

author: stephen
title: stephen
text: What can I say? The whole prices from finding the right you, ordering and finally receiving the product is flawless. The website is so user friendly and takes the sometimes uneasiness of visiting an actual physical high street store. The user videos that accompany all the products are so helpful in decision making and you get to gauge actual size and shape. Ordering is so straightforward (I always use paypal), simple easy steps and love honey points as well. Delivery is always as promised and descretly packaged. All in all 10/10.
